Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='PP84')

BibliographicData.Title: Projections to frontal cortex from the posterior parietal region in the rhesus monkey

BrainSite.FullName: Upper bank of the intraparietal sulcus
Caudal and medial superior parietal lobule
Caudal part of the cingulate sulcus
Midpart of the inferior parietal lobule
Lower bank of the intraparietal sulcus

Reference.Quotation: "...case 1 with an injection in the middle part of the upper bank of the intraparietal sulcus (area PEa) and adjacent superior parietal lobule (area PE)..."
"There were three cases with injections in the rostral part of the inferior parietal lobule, area PF (Fig. 2, Cases 10-12)."
"There were three cases (Fig. 2, cases 13-15) in which the injection site occupied area PFG and the rostral part of area PG."
"There were three cases (Fig. 2, cases 13-15) in which the injection site occupied area PFG and the rostral part of area PG."
"Four cases had injections in the posteriormost part of the inferior parietal lobule occupied by areas PG and Opt (Fig. 2, cases 16-19)."
"Four cases had injections in the posteriormost part of the inferior parietal lobule occupied by areas PG and Opt (Fig. 2, cases 16-19)."
"...case 6 with an injection in the caudal part of the superior parietal lobule (areas PE and PEc)."

"In three cases (Fig. 2, cases 7-9), the injections were made in the cortex on the medial part of the parietal lobe involving areas PEc and PGm as well as area PEci in the caudal tip of the cingulate sulcus."

"In three cases (Fig. 2, cases 7-9), the injections were made in the cortex on the medial part of the parietal lobe involving areas PEc and PGm as well as area PEci in the caudal tip of the cingulate sulcus."
Reference.Comments: According to Fig. 2, the injection does not affect the caudal part of the cingulate sulcus (area PEci).
